    • Uses of CryptographicHash in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamalHash

      Constructor and Description
      CmtElGamalHashCommitter(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, CryptographicHash hash, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      This constructor receives as arguments an instance of a Dlog Group and an instance of a Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.
      CmtElGamalHashReceiver(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, CryptographicHash hash)
      This constructor receives as arguments an instance of a Dlog Group and an instance of a Cryptographic Hash such that they keep the condition that the size in bytes of the resulting hash is less than the size in bytes of the order of the DlogGroup.

    • Uses of CryptographicHash in edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc

      Constructors in edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.bc with parameters of type CryptographicHash 
      Constructor and Description
      BcHMAC(CryptographicHash hash)
      This constructor gets a SCAPI collision resistant hash to be the underlying hash and retrieves the name of the hash in order to create the related digest for the BC Hmac this class uses.
      BcHMAC(CryptographicHash hash, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      This constructor gets a random and a SCAPI collision resistant hash to be the underlying hash and retrieves the name of the hash in order to create the related digest for the BC Hmac this class uses.
